Verses: 1 kadal Vanaandharaththin Baaram. Suzhalkaatru Thenthisaiyilirundhu Ezhumbik Kadandhuvarugiradhupola, Bayangaramaana Dhesamaagiya Vanaandharaththilirundhu Adhu Varugiradhu.

2 kodiya Dharisanam Enakkuth Therivikkappattadhu; Dhrogi Dhrogampanni Paazhaakkiravan Paazhaakkikkonde Irukkiraan; Elaame Ezhumbu; Medhiyaave Mutrikkaipodu; Adhinaale Undaana Thavippaiyellaam Ozhiyappanninen.
3 aagaiyaal, En Iduppu Magaa Vedhanaiyaal Niraindhirukkiradhu; Pillaiperugiravalin Vedhanaigalukku Oththa Vedhanaigal Ennaip Pidiththadhu; Kettadhinaal Ulaivukondu, Kandadhinaal Kalanginen.
4 en Irudhayam Thigaiththadhu; Thigil Ennaith Thidukkidappannitru; Enakku Inbanthandha Iravu Bayangaramaayitru.
5 pandhiyai Aayaththappaduththungal, Jaamakkaararai Vaiyungal, Pusiyungal Kudiyungal; Prabukkale, Ezhundhu Parisaigalukku Enney Poosungal.
6 aandavar Ennai Nokki: Nee Poi, Kaanbadhaith Therivikkumpadi Jaamakkaaranai Vai Endraar.
7 avan Oru Radhaththaiyum, Jodu Jodaana Kudhiraiveeraraiyum, Jodu Jodaagak Kazhudhaigalinmelum Ottagangalinmelum Erivarugiravargalaiyum Kandu, Migundha Gavanamaaik Gavaniththukkonde Irundhu:
8 aandavare, Naan Pagalmuzhudhum En Kaavalile Nindru, Raamuzhudhum Naan En Kaavalidaththile Thariththirukkiren Endru Singaththaippol Saththamittuk Kooppidugiraan.

9 idho, Oru Jodu Kudhirai Poonda Radhaththinmel Eriyirukkira Oru Manushan Varugiraan; Baabilon Vizhundhadhu, Vizhundhadhu; Adhin Vikkiragadhevargalaiyellaam Tharaiyode Modhi Udaiththaar Endru Pradhiyuththaram Sollugiraan.
10 en Poradippin Dhaaniyame, Kalaththin Kodhumaiye, Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Senaigalin Karththaraal Naan Kelvippattadhai Ungalukku Ariviththen.
11 thoomaavin Baaram. Seyeerilirundhu Ennai Nokki: Jaamakkaarane, Iravu Evvalavu Sendradhu? Endru Kooppittuk Ketka;
12 adharku Jaamakkaaran: Vidiyarkaalam Varugiradhu Raakkaalamum Varugiradhu; Neengal Ketka Manadhaanaal Thirumbivandhu Kelungal Endru Sollugiraan.
13 arabiyaavin Baaram. Thidhaaniyaraagiya Payanakkoottangale, Neengal Arabiyaavin Kaadugalil Raaththanguveergal.
14 themaadhesaththin Kudigale, Neengal Thaagamaayirukkiravargalukkuth Thanneer Kondupoi, Thappi Odugiravargalukku Appankodukka Edhirkondupongal.
15 avargal, Pattayangalukkum, Uruvina Katkaththukkum Naanetrina Villukkum, Yuththaththin Kodumaikkum Thappi Odugiraargal.
16 aandavar Ennai Nokki: Oru Koolikkaaranudaiya Varushangalukkoththa Ore Varushaththile Kedhaarudaiya Magimaiyellaam Atruppom.
17 kedhaar Puththiraraagiya Paraakkirama Vilveerarin Thogaiyil Meedhiyaanavargal Konjapperaayiruppaargal Endraar; Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Idhai Uraiththaar.
